A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I sincerely don't understand the negativity surrounding this film. I found it to be engaging and entertaining. For those wishing it was more like the original trilogy\, perhaps you are not as big of a fan as you think. It has more similarities than Episodes 1-3 and\, yes\, even The Force Awakens. It is not a remake of Empire\, as Awakens was to New Hope. This is a good thing. It progresses the narrative of the Saga\, while staying true to the source material. If you wanted another Empire\, just go back and watch it...
